description: MADRID- In the early hours of May 20, Iranian media announced the death of President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, the governor of East Azerbaijan province, Malek Rahmati, the Leader’s representative to the province, Mohammad Ali Al-e Hashem, and the president's security detail head.
title: Raisi: a brief presidency with an enduring legacy

description: A senior member of Hamas’s political bureau says it was the “brave resistance” of the Palestinian people that spurred Norway, Ireland and Spain to announce that they will recognize Palestine as a state.
title: Hamas: Resistance spurred recognition

description: Longtime Palestinian politician Mustafa Barghouti said recognition of the Palestinian state by Ireland, Spain and Norway was a “powerful political and symbolically significant step” that moved the achievement of “freedom and justice” closer for the Palestinian people.
title: Barghouti: Israeli fascists received a blow

description: TEHRAN - The decision by three European countries to formally recognize Palestine as a state will lead to a heightened sense of isolation for both Israel and the United States, as they face growing international pressure over Tel Aviv’s brutal onslaught on the Gaza Strip.
title: Domino effect: Three European countries recognize Palestinian state

description: TEHRAN- Israeli media has revealed that some ministers in the "Political-Security Cabinet" have been banned from receiving sensitive information that has been leaked amid the genocidal war on Gaza.
title: Israeli ministers "banned" from sensitive info

description: The Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) applauded announcements from Spain, Norway, and Ireland to recognize Palestine as a state.
title: OIC: Historic step in line with intl. law

description: Israeli opposition leader Yair Lapid decried a Palestinian state recognition by Spain, Norway and Ireland as an “unprecedented political failure.”
title: Lapid acknowledges Israel’s “political failure”

description: The ongoing crimes in the West Bank, especially in the city and refugee camp of Jenin, “forewarn of an imminent popular storm against these Israeli invasions that have targeted all aspects of Palestinian life”, Haroun Nasser al-Din, a member of Hamas’s political bureau, has said, according to Al Jazeera.
title: Hamas official calls for uprising in West Bank

description: The Facebook and Instagram owner Meta approved a series of AI-manipulated political adverts during India’s election that spread disinformation and incited religious violence, according to a report shared exclusively with the Guardian.
title: Guardian: Meta allows hate speech against Muslims

description: Hotheads in the US Congress look determined to further provoke tensions around Ukraine and follow Washington's general policy of continuing the war to the last Ukrainian, Russian Presidential spokesman Dmitry Peskov has told the media while commenting on the idea of a group of congressmen about strikes on Russian territory with US weapons.
title: Russia: Hotheads in Congress escalate tensions

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei received the President of Tunisia and his accompanying delegation on Wednesday and expressed gratitude for the brotherly and heartfelt sentiments of President Kais Saied.
title: Tunisia’s political position should expand to the Arab world: Leader

description: TEHRAN – In a display of international solidarity, high-ranking officials from 68 countries and several international organizations have traveled to Iran to honor the late President and Foreign Minister of Iran, who tragically died in a helicopter crash on Sunday.
title: World leaders in Tehran to pay tribute to late president, FM

description: TEHRAN - In a poignant and sorrowful display, the people of Tehran gathered in overwhelming numbers to participate in the funeral ceremony for the late President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian.
title: Glorious Farewell

description: TEHRAN - During a meeting on Wednesday, Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan expressed his condolences to Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei for the tragic passing of President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: Iran will continue to expand relations with Armenia: Leader

description: TEHRAN – Ismail Haniyeh, head of the political bureau of Hamas Resistance Movement, met with Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei on Monday to convey his condolences over the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian.
title: Divine promise of Palestine’s liberation ‘from the river to the sea’ will be fulfilled: Leader

description: TEHRAN - Iraqi Prime Minister Mohammed Shia’ Al-Sudani met with Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei on May 22, 2024, to offer condolences on behalf of the Iraqi government and nation following the tragic passing of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: Iraqi PM expresses deep sorrow over passing of late Raisi in meeting with Leader

description: TEHRAN- In a meeting with Pakistan’s Prime Minister Mohammad Shahbaz Sharif, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution lauded Islamabad for its heartfelt condolences over the martyrdom of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian.
title: Leader thanks Pakistan for deep sympathy over passing of President Raisi

description: TEHRAN – Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, hailed the public mourning period in Lebanon that was announced over the passing of President Ebrahim Raisi as a testament to the closeness of ties between Iran and the Arab country.
title: Iran-Lebanon ties rooted in kinship and brotherhood: Leader

description: TEHRAN – In a meeting with the Emir of Qatar, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei highlighted Iran’s determination to carry on the path initiated by the late President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: Iran’s course will not change despite latest tragedy: Leader

description: TEHRAN - Israel’s war minister Yoav Gallant on Tuesday urged “nations of the civilized world” to oppose the request by the International Criminal Court Prosecutor Ahmad Khan for arrest warrants against Israel’s leaders and to declare they would ignore the warrants.
title: “Civilized world” demands prosecution for uncivilized war criminals

description: TEHRAN – Home to a great number of walnut trees, Gerdoo (meaning walnut in Persian) valley, located in southern Arak, Iran, is a pleasant ambiance to escape from the hustle and bustle of big cities.
title: Gerdoo valley: a landscape adorned with walnut trees

description: TEHRAN-The estimated number of purchased books at the 35th Tehran International Book Fair (TIBF) is around 3.5 million, with the total sales of the fair amounting to 5,920 billion rials ($10 million), the spokesperson of the fair Ali Ramezani announced.
title: 3.5 million books sold at 35th TIBF

description: TEHRAN - Sheiba Khadir, a senior expert affiliated with the Research Institute for Conservation and Restoration of Historical and Cultural Artifacts, has emphasized the importance of laboratory studies in the restoration of historical coins.
title: Expert illuminates crucial role of lab studies in historical coin conservation

description: TEHRAN - Global tourism has made a remarkable comeback, reaching 97% of pre-pandemic levels in the first quarter of 2024, according to the latest data from the UN Tourism.
title: Global tourism nears full recovery, reaching 97% of pre-pandemic levels in early 2024

description: TEHRAN- A new Persian translation of “The Secret Garden” by British-American novelist and playwright Frances Hodgson Burnett has recently been published by Now Publications in Tehran.
title: “The Secret Garden” appears in Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN - The President of the World Crafts Council (WCC), Sa’ad al-Qaddumi, has expressed profound condolences following the martyrdom of the President of the Islamic Republic of Iran, Ebrahim Raisi, in a helicopter crash.
title: WCC president extends condolences over martyrdom of Iranian president

description: TEHRAN – In a bid to preserve the pristine ecosystem of the Miankaleh peninsula while fostering sustainable tourism, a pioneering initiative is in the pipeline.
title: Ecotourism to take center stage in Miankaleh

description: TEHRAN-In separate messages, Milyausha Aytuganova, the executive director of the Kazan International Film Festival, and Amrit Gangar, Indian film scholar and historian, expressed their condolences for the passing of Iranian President Ayatollah Seyyed Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian along and accompanying delegation in a tragic helicopter crash in the northwest of the country on Sunday.
title: Cinema Verite Intl. jury members condole passing of President Raisi, accompanying delegation

description: MASHHAD- For several days, the city of Mashhad was buzzing with excitement as it prepared to celebrate the grand anniversary of the birth of Imam Reza (AS), the eighth Imam of the Shia. The usually vibrant streets were adorned with colorful decorations, and the sweet scent of traditional sweets and fruits wafted through the air, filling every corner with a sense of joy and anticipation. The atmosphere was electric, as people from all walks of life eagerly awaited the celebrations to begin.
title: Mashhad mourns: city in sorrow after president's tragic death, joyful celebrations turn to mourning

description: TEHRAN – Vyacheslav Volodin, the Chairman of the Russian State Duma, has arrived in Tehran to offer condolences on the death of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, and their companions.
title: Chairman of the Russian State Duma arrives in Tehran for Raisi’s funeral

description: TEHRAN – Iran defeated Tajikistan 37-0 in the 2024 Men's Indoor Hockey Asia Cup on Wednesday.
title: Iran thrash Tajikistan at 2024 Men's Indoor Hockey Asia Cup

description: TEHRAN - Ali Akbar Ahmadian, Secretary of Iran’s Supreme National Security Council, has praised the late President Ebrahim Raisi for introducing a new style of governance and management.
title: Iran's security chief lauds President Raisi's innovative governance style

description: TEHRAN – Pakistan’s Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif has arrived in Iran to attend a memorial ceremony for President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian.
title: Pakistani PM offers condolences over demise of Iranian president in Tehran visit

description: TEHRAN – Sergei Aleinik, the Belarusian Minister of Foreign Affairs, has landed in Tehran to join the commemoration ceremony for late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian.
title: Belarusian FM arrives in Tehran to pay tribute to late President, FM

description: TEHRAN –A Persian yellow deer was born in Dez National Park, southwestern Khuzestan province; it is the first yellow deer born in its natural habitat, not in captivity.
title: First yellow deer born in natural habitat

description: TEHRAN –Loss of biological diversity, upon which human existence and wellbeing depend, threatens the whole earth, while each individual can play a key role in its preservation.
title: 'Be part of the plan' to preserve environment

description: TEHRAN – The Global Alliance of Special Economic Zones (GASEZ) has recognized Isfahan Science, Technology Town (ISTT) as a 2023 Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) model zone partner for its commitment towards sustainable development.
title: Isfahan Science, Technology Town recognized as SDG model zone partner

description: TEHRAN – The Central Bank of Iran (CBI) supplied $921 million of subsidized foreign currency for the country’s industrial sector in the previous Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19), IRNA reported.
title: CBI pays $900m to industries in subsidized foreign currency

description: TEHRAN - Less than three years after the late Ebrahim Raisi took power as Iran’s president, the country has gained great achievements in joining major international organizations.
title: Iran joined major international organizations during Raisi’s tenure
Loss of biodiversity – a hidden threat to food security and habitat

description: TEHRAN - Tajik President Emomali Rahmon has landed in Tehran to attend a funeral ceremony for Iran’s President Ebrahim Raisi, who was martyred in a helicopter crash in Iran’s East Azerbaijan Province on Sunday.
title: Tajikistan’s Rahmon in Iran to attend late Raisi’s funeral ceremony

description: TEHRAN- Rear Admiral Alireza Tangsiri, commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) Navy, has paid tribute to the late President Ebrahim Raisi, emphasizing his grassroots approach, tireless work ethic, and deep commitment to the principles of velayat.
title: IRGC navy chief says President Raisi was tireless, velayat-loving

description: TEHRAN – Jagdeep Dhankhar, the Vice President of India, has arrived in Tehran, on top of a delegation, to offer condolences on the death of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, and their companions.
title: India’s VP visits Iran to pay condolences to Late President, FM at funeral

description: TEHRAN - Nabih Berri, the Speaker of the Lebanese Parliament, has arrived in Tehran accompanied by a delegation to participate in the commemoration ceremony dedicated to the martyred president and the martyrs of service.
title: Lebanese parliament speaker heads delegation to Iran to attend Raisi's funeral

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Defense Minister Brigadier General Mohammad Reza Ashtiani has underscored the guiding principles of the late President Ebrahim Raisi, emphasizing his dedication to serving the Iranian people.
title: Defense minister highlights President Raisi's commitment to service

description: TEHRAN - The head of Iran Agricultural Information Sciences and Technology (IAIST) said the agricultural sector of the country will enter the world of metaverse to improve productivity.
title: Iran’s agricultural sector to apply ‘metaverse’ to increase productivity

description: TEHRAN - The director general of the Mediterranean and Eastern Europe Department of Iran’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs said the Iran-Turkey Joint Economic Cooperation Committee meeting will be held in the coming days to bolster bilateral ties in trade and economy.
title: Iran-Turkey Joint Economic Cooperation Commission to be held soon

description: TEHRAN - The 15th Meeting of Heads of ECO Railway Authorities, and 9th Meeting of Railway Committee of the Transit Transport Coordination Council was held in Tehran on Tuesday.
title: Tehran hosts 15th Meeting of Heads of ECO Railway Authorities

description: TEHRAN - President Kais Saied of Tunisia has made a historic visit to Tehran, marking the first time a Tunisian leader has visited the country.
title: Tunisian President makes historic visit to Iran to honor late Iranian President

description: TEHRAN – Sameh Shoukry, the Egyptian Minister of Foreign Affairs, has arrived in Tehran to attend the commemoration ceremony honoring the late Iranian President, Ebrahim Raisi, and The Iranian foreign minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian.
title: Egyptian FM Sameh Shoukry arrives in Tehran for Raisi's funeral

description: TEHRAN – The President of Uzbekistan has arrived in the Iranian capital of Tehran to attend the farewell ceremony for President Ebrahim Raisi and Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian who lost their lives during a helicopter crash on Sunday.
title: Uzbek President arrives in Tehran to pay tribute to late Iranian counterpart

description: TEHRAN – India defeated Iran in straight sets (25-17, 25-23, 25-21) in the opening match of the 2024 AVC Challenge Cup for Women on Wednesday.
title: India down Iran at 2024 AVC Challenge Cup for Women

description: TEHRAN – Saeid Afrooz of Iran claimed a gold medal at the 2024 World Para Athletics Championships on Wednesday.
title: Iran’s Afrooz takes gold at 2024 World Para Athletics

description: TEHRAN - At the funeral ceremony for President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, Hamas political chief Ismail Haniyeh delivered a heartfelt speech, expressing his profound gratitude for President Raisi's unwavering commitment to the liberation of Palestine.
title: Hamas chief lauds late President Raisi's unwavering support for Palestinian Resistance

description: TEHRAN - Amidst an outpouring of grief and reverence, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei solemnly led the funeral prayer for the late President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian on Wednesday morning.
title: Ayatollah Khamenei leads funeral prayer for late President, FM

description: TEHRAN - Amidst an outpouring of grief and reverence, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei solemnly led the funeral prayer for the late President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian on Tuesday morning.
title: Iran's Leader leads funeral prayer for late Iranian President, FM

description: BEIRUT- In the wake of the shocking incident that befell President Seyed Ebrahim Raisi and his companions, the Lebanese people spent the night before their martyrdom pleading to the Almighty for their safety.  This tremendous loss has revealed the wide popularity this exceptional scholar among them.
title: Martyrdom of Raisi & Amir Abdollahian, a great loss to the Islamic nation & humanity

description: BEIRUT- In the wake of the shocking incident that befell President Seyed Ebrahim Raisi and his companions, the Lebanese people spent the night before their martyrdom pleading to the Almighty for their safety.  This tremendous loss has revealed the wide popularity this exceptional scholar among them.
title: Martyrdom of Raisi and Amir Abdollahian, a great loss to the Islamic nation and humanity

description: LAHORE- My younger son Raham, who is still nine years old, came running to me and paused to catch his breath. I was just looking at him when he suddenly said, “A few days ago, you met the Iranian uncle in Lahore and your photos were also published with him, his helicopter has gone missing.”
title: Memories of friend of Pakistan

description: TEHRAN - Hundreds of thousands of people are converging on the University of Tehran located in the Iranian capital, where Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei will be leading the funeral prayer for the late President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Amir Abdollahian.
title: Tehran prepares for President Raisi’s funeral prayer led by Leader
